text: Presidential elections were held in :France in 1974, following the death of President Georges Pompidou. They went to a second round, and were won by Valéry Giscard d'Estaing by a margin of 1.6%. It is to date the closest presidential election in French history. ==Other websites== * Radio-TV debate Valéry Giscard d'Estaing/François Mitterrand Category:1970s in France Category:1974 in Europe Category:Presidential elections in France Category:Valéry Giscard d'Estaing
title: 1974 French presidential election
